content: April 23 Oil drilling contractors Patterson-UTI Energy Inc and Helmerich & Payne Inc reported higher-than-expected quarterly profits as demand for their hi-tech rigs remained resilient despite the slump in crude prices.
name: Helmerich & Payne Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Patterson-UTI  Helmerich & Payne gain on buoyant demand for hi-tech rigs

content: April 23 Oil and gas driller Helmerich & Payne Inc reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as demand for its high-tech rigs remained resilient despite the slump in crude prices.
name: Helmerich & Payne Inc
title: Helmerich & Payne profit beats on strong demand for high-tech rigs

content: Driller Helmerich & Payne Inc  said it may cut 2 000 jobs as it begins to idle rigs amid a slide in crude oil prices  following similar cost cuts by top oilfield services providers Schlumberger NV  and Baker Hughes Inc .
name: Helmerich & Payne Inc
title: Helmerich & Payne may cut 2 000 jobs as it idles rigs

content: * Shares fall as much as 10 pct   (Adds analyst  executive comment  background; updates shares)

content: Jan 29 Oil and gas driller Helmerich & Payne Inc  reported higher quarterly profit due to compensation from early termination of contracts  and warned results for the rest of 2015 would be hurt by a steep fall in oil prices.
name: Helmerich & Payne Inc
title: Helmerich & Payne profit rises; warns of weak 2015 amid oil fall

content: HOUSTON  Jan 7 U.S. onshore drilling contractor Helmerich & Payne on Wednesday said rates for its high-tech rigs have tumbled 10 percent from the previous quarter and more softness is expected due to falling crude oil prices.
name: Helmerich & Payne Inc
title: Driller Helmerich says rig prices down 10 percent
